title: Old video of a delivery boy taking bread from a truck is being shared with a false narrative
subtitle: The video is six months old and is from the Philippines. In it, the delivery boy took bread slices for his personal use from the packets that were meant for disposal by the company.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video is being shared widely on Facebook claiming that the delivery boy in it is spitting on the slices of bread by opening the packets in the truck and resealing them for sale to spread Coronavirus. FACTLY has found that the incident took place in the Philippines in September 2019. In the video, the delivery boy took bread slices for his personal use from the packets that were meant for disposal by the company. The company ‘Gardenia’, whose bread packets were seen in the video, has said that it is the violation of rules and procedures of the company and the personnel involved in it was undergoing the due administrative process.
